text: haey shai t n ban thveu aoy puokkeat teangpir khleat chenhpi thansuokr ning thveu aoy khleatachhngay pi avei del puokkeat teangpir thleab mean now tinoh . haey yeung ban mean bantoul tha chaur puok anak( a dam ha vea ai pli sa) chohtow rsanow( leu phendei) knong pheap chea sa trauv nungoknea choh haey phendei kuchea kanleng rsanow robsa puok anak ning mean pheap sabbayrikreay rhautadl avsan nei chivit
